data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wu, Tie-Jun, Yang, Jian (2019): Sinibotia lani, a new species of botiid loach (Teleostei: Botiidae) from Guangxi, China. Zootaxa 4679 (1): 97-106, DOI: 10.11646/zootaxa.4679.1.6|2 occurrences
